summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DataPulse application - both backend APIs (100% working from previous iteration) and frontend UI are fully functional with excellent user experience

Quick Actions panel with New Project, New Form, Manage Team, Export Data buttons
Projects page navigation and display of 'Baseline Survey 2024' project
Create Project functionality available
Forms page navigation and display of 'Household Survey' form (published)
Create Form functionality available
Form Builder page with 14 field types (Text, Number, Long Text, Date, Dropdown, Single Choice, Multiple Choice, GPS Location, Photo, Audio, Note, Calculate, Group, Repeat Group)

Submissions table showing 3 pending submissions with GPS coordinates (-1.2921, 36.8219)
Team page with member management and role statistics (1 Admin, 0 Managers, 0 Analysts, 0 Enumerators)

Organization selector showing 'ACME Research' organization
Sidebar navigation working for all menu items (Dashboard, Projects, Forms, Submissions, Cases, Quality, Exports, Team, Settings)
User profile menu with logout functionality
Responsive design with professional dark theme
DataPulse branding and clean UI design

Real data integration (not mock data)
Session management and authentication flow
